text: I forget the name of the package I am thinking of

elements.text: I forget the name of the package I am thinking of

text: Are you thinking of the Network Dynamics package? They simulate the Kuramoto model and others that are often used as neuron models, right? I think you can do any arbitrary model with that one, like the Hodgekin-Huxley model as well.

elements.text: Are you thinking of the Network Dynamics package? They simulate the Kuramoto model and others that are often used as neuron models, right? I think you can do any arbitrary model with that one, like the Hodgekin-Huxley model as well.
